name: Super Robo Squad
description:
Use the power of the Super Robo Squad to fight off the evil enemy robots who are attacking!
In this turn based combat puzzle select the order in which you want your colourful party members to attack and watch as they unleash a wide array of vibrant powers!
Learn the 1s and 0s of this intricate combat system in order to really send the enemy robots home by taking advatnage of their weakpoint to sequence break them!

First have tutorial bot take you through Tutorial mode, then once you've learned the ropes test your might in Endless or Challenge mode!

Simply click with the mouse to select your attack order and to interact with the UI.

Check out the source code here: https://github.com/gjcampbell777/Super-Robo-Squad
